Articles.Content: Alright, say I build this marvelous rocket with 300 parts to go to Duna. Then, I wanna go on eva, come back get on ship, but all my stages are messed up. Why? And I think it does this too when you switch vessels then back.
Don't really have a fix for this bug but can relate. I also have this problem but I believe they *may* have had this issue on pc in the past.
